duties_responsibilities.duty: Ability to understand and apply Geometric Dimension & Tolerancing or International equivalent at an advanced level.
3D model several complex devices and smaller housings.
Perform intermediate level linear stackup studies.
Solid understanding of manufacturing and assembly processes.
Works with some latitude and minimal supervision, performs diverse and intermediate level design assignments.
Demonstrated commitment to quality and professionalism.
Strong communication and interpersonal skills. Demonstrated ability to effectively interact with all levels of the organization.
Solid organization and prioritization skills, not only for self but for those supported by this position.
The ability to interact cooperatively and collaboratively with others as a team.
The ability to define, diagnose, and resolve problems and the ability to make decisions in a timely manner, sometimes with limited information and under tight deadlines and pressure.
The ability and willingness to take independent action and complete job tasks with minimal instruction.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Mechanical Engineering, or International equivalent (Master's preferred)
